title: Can we bring back honoring enemy players??
body: Title, a lot of the time i want to honor the enemy players for being sportsmanlike and/or fun to play against. Why did they remove that feature?

replies.body: I absolutely agree, I've made just as many friends with the enemy team as I have from my own team.

i wouldnt mind having it back. but 1st can we stop honoring for kda/damage 1st? 

that does not directly relate to any of the 3 reason to honor someone.

> [{quoted}](name=MrFawknSunshine,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=7tghEutu,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-11-29T22:05:38.504+0000)
>
> i wouldnt mind having it back. but 1st can we stop honoring for kda/damage 1st? 
> 
> that does not directly relate to any of the 3 reason to honor someone.

it is not like Riot can impliement a way to stop that.
never said they could we can as a player base

I agree. Personally, it felt better getting honored from the enemy team over getting honors from teammates just because I played good that game. If I played bad, I would only get a salt fountain towards me with threats of reports.
i am so sad honoring enemies is gone, it is one of the most rewarding feelings

Idk  for me the most rewarding feeling is that when the enemy jungler or whoever claiming to be smurfing and getting his ass beaten by me stop calling me trash silver and  hardstuck low elo trash.

Now thats the best feeling.
It make more sense honoring your enemy when people that are duoing etc are going to honor each other each game. {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

Seriously. There are plenty of games where I had more fun bantering with the enemy team than anything else because my team never does much besides mute or flame. Kind of a funny trend, but I feel like I get along with the enemy team better most of the time.
Id like that feature back. I had a great game with a player and now were drawing comics together about the match we had.
When the new system was made they didn't put that in cause there was too much going on on-screen.
Agreed, I liked that feature. just like someone else, I would prefer that over having to pick from a 4 man pre-made on my own team.

gotta hit that upvote really hard.
Riot says they are working on this... a year ago.
i hope it will be back soon. maybe new season?
I used to honor an opponent almost every game, I miss it! If someone's nice I want to help raise their honor, no matter what team :(
I miss the old honor system.
